ivory.ffg.data
Class DocumentVectorMiniInvertedIndex

java.lang.Object
  ivory.ffg.data.DocumentVectorMiniInvertedIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentVector, Writable
public class DocumentVectorMiniInvertedIndex
extends Object
implements DocumentVector

Implementation of an (mini-)indexed document vector refered to as IDV. In this class, term ids are encoded using PForDelta whereas positions are compressed using the gamma coding.

Author:
Nima Asadi
